org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.grouping

Class GroupingGroupCombine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.grouping.Grouping
      • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.grouping.GroupingGroupCombine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operator, UnaryBaseGraphToBaseGraphOperator<LogicalGraph>, UnaryBaseGraphToValueOperator<LogicalGraph,LogicalGraph>, UnaryGraphToGraphOperator

    public class GroupingGroupCombine
extends Grouping
    Grouping implementation that uses group + groupCombine + groupReduce for building super vertices and updating the original vertices. Algorithmic idea: 1) Map vertices to a minimal representation, i.e. VertexGroupItem. 2) Group vertices on label and/or property 3) Use groupCombine to process the grouped partitions. Creates a super vertex tuple for each group partition, including the local aggregates. Update each vertex tuple with their super vertex id and forward them. 4) Filter output of 3) a) super vertex tuples are filtered, grouped and merged via groupReduce to create a final super vertex representing the group. An additional mapping from the final super vertex id to the super vertex ids of the original partitions is also created. b) non-candidate tuples are mapped to VertexWithSuperVertex using the broadcasted mapping output of 4a) 5) Map edges to a minimal representation, i.e. EdgeGroupItem 6) Join edges with output of 4b) and replace source/target id with super vertex id. 7) Updated edges are grouped by source and target id and optionally by label and/or edge property. 8) Group combine on the workers and compute aggregate. 9) Group reduce globally and create final super edges.
